# Data (Placeholder)

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nam nec ante. Sed lacinia, urna non tincidunt mattis.

```{r packages}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r make-data}
set.seed(123)

dat <- tibble(
  id = 1:200,
  group = sample(c("A", "B"), size = 200, replace = TRUE),
  x = rnorm(200),
  eps = rnorm(200, sd = 0.8)
) %>%
  mutate(
    y = 0.5 + 1.2 * x + if_else(group == "B", 0.7, 0) + eps
  )
```

```{r summary}
dat %>%
  group_by(group) %>%
  summarise(
    n = n(),
    mean_x = mean(x),
    sd_x = sd(x),
    mean_y = mean(y),
    sd_y = sd(y),
    .groups = "drop"
  )
```

## Scatter + Linear Fit

```{r ggplot-scatter, fig.alt="Synthetic data; replace with your own dataset"}
ggplot(dat, aes(x = x, y = y, colour = group)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.6) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = TRUE) +
  labs(
    title = "Placeholder Scatterplot with Linear Fit",
    subtitle = "Synthetic data; replace with your own dataset",
    x = "x",
    y = "y",
    colour = "Group"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
```

## Distribution Plot

```{r ggplot-density, fig.alt="Placeholder Density Plot"}
ggplot(dat, aes(x = y, fill = group)) +
  geom_density(alpha = 0.4) +
  labs(
    title = "Placeholder Density Plot",
    x = "y",
    y = "Density",
    fill = "Group"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
```
